parameters.name: RegionId
parameters.description:
The region ID of the route table.

You can call the [DescribeRegions](~~36063~~) operation to query the most recent region list.

parameters.name: RouteEntryType
parameters.description:
The type of the route. Valid values:

*   **All**: all route types
*   **Custom**: a custom route
*   **System**: a system route
*   **BGP**: a BGP route
*   **CEN**: a Cloud Enterprise Network (CEN) route

parameters.name: RouteTableId
parameters.description: The ID of the route table that you want to query.

parameters.name: VpcId
parameters.description: The ID of the virtual private cloud (VPC) to which the route table belongs.
